name: HellMaze
description:
It's a game of cute characters' journey to find a cool drink in the wilderness desert.
It is a game that can be enjoyed lightly only by keyboard operation.
As you move through the maze, find coins and vending machines and pick up a cool beverage can from ice.

Features

- A maze puzzle arcade game that moves a 3D maze with 20 levels
- 10 selectable characters with different stats
- More than 30 traps and obstacles
- More than 20 different mobs
- Number of Challenges and Clear Time and Result Statistics
- Show directions for beginners
- Zoom out function for a wider view
